casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dennis O'Keith BLACKWELL. No. 525P13-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Dennis O'Keith Blackwell, for Blackwell, Dennis O'Keith. Wallace W. Bradsher, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of October 2015 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
